name: v2.16.2
body:
## What's Changed
* Fix last_index counter lag by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/507
* Fix off by one in follower assertion. by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/509
* Fix log divergence bug by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/508


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/compare/v2.16.1...v2.16.2

name: v2.15.2
body: **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/compare/v1.15.1...v2.15.2

name: v2.16.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Fix log/2 effect regression. by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/505
* Only log ETS delete time if it's more than 25ms by @mkuratczyk in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/504
* Force pipelined rpcs for noop command. by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/506


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/compare/v2.16.0...v2.16.1

name: v2.16.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Ra log v2 by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/475
* Log init bug by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/476
* New log effect type: `log_ext` that allows entries residing in segment files to be read by another process. by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/477
* fix a type spec by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/478
* Handle case where mem table is deleted during segment writer flush by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/479
* Bazel: use latest rules_erlang by @michaelklishin in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/481
* Handle segment writer crash by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/484
* Check membership before transferring leadership by @anhanhnguyen in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/482
* Optimise read planning by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/487
* Fix segment read bug when segment has been appended to by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/488
* Segment fadvise by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/489
* Refactor consistent query by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/491
* Extend WAL and segment file names from 8 to 16 characters by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/496
* Delay machine upgrade until all members are up-to-date by @dumbbell in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/493
* Introduce initial_machine_version server config. by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/498
* Improve some multi line log messages. by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/499
* Enable async_dist by default for Ra server processes. by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/501
* Fix issue with sparse reading a segment that is being modified. by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/503

Ra 2.16.0 now requires Erlang/OTP 26.

## New Contributors
* @anhanhnguyen made their first contribution in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/482

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/compare/v2.15.0...v2.16.0

name: v2.16.0-pre.12
body:

* Improve some multi line log messages. by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/499
* Enable async_dist by default for Ra server processes. by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/501
* Fix issue with sparse reading a segment that is being modified. by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/503


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/compare/v2.16.0-pre.11...v2.16.0-pre.12

name: v2.16.0-pre.10
body:
## What's Changed
* Ra log v2 by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/475
* Log init bug by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/476
* New log effect type: `log_ext` that allows entries residing in segment files to be read by another process. by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/477
* fix a type spec by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/478
* Handle case where mem table is deleted during segment writer flush by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/479
* Bazel: use latest rules_erlang by @michaelklishin in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/481
* Handle segment writer crash by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/484
* Check membership before transferring leadership by @anhanhnguyen in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/482
* Optimise read planning by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/487
* Fix segment read bug when segment has been appended to by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/488
* Segment fadvise by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/489
* Refactor consistent query by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/491
* Extend WAL and segment file names from 8 to 16 characters by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/496
* Delay machine upgrade until all members are up-to-date by @dumbbell in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/493

## New Contributors
* @anhanhnguyen made their first contribution in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/482

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/compare/v2.15.0...v2.16.0-pre.10

name: v2.15.0
body:
## What's Changed
* OTP 27 test and compatibility by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/465
* ra_server: handle higher-term AERs in `receive_snapshot` state by @keynslug in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/470
* ra_aux: Expose effective machine version, current term by @the-mikedavis in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/474

## New Contributors
* @keynslug made their first contribution in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/470

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/compare/v2.14.0...v2.15.0

name: v2.14.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Add `ra_machine:snapshot_installed/4` callback to pass old state by @the-mikedavis in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/467
* Amend ra_machine:snapshot_installed/4 by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/468
* Handle calls and queries in receive_snapshot state by @the-mikedavis in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/466


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/compare/v2.13.6...v2.14.0

name: v2.13.6
body:
## What's Changed
* Add `ra:key_metrics/2` by @dumbbell in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/461
* ra_server: Add a new `last_applied` state query by @dumbbell in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/462
* Stop checkpoint validation when encountering a valid checkpoint by @the-mikedavis in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/463
* Kill snapshot process before deleting everything by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/464


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/compare/v2.13.5...v2.13.6

name: v2.13.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Add `read` to `file:open/2` options in `ra_lib:sync_file/1` by @the-mikedavis in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/452
* Emit the new `local_query` tuple only if query options are set by @dumbbell in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/451
* Checkpoint improvements by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/454


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/compare/v2.12.0...v2.13.0

name: v2.13.0-pre.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Add `read` to `file:open/2` options in `ra_lib:sync_file/1` by @the-mikedavis in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/452
* Emit the new `local_query` tuple only if query options are set by @dumbbell in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/451

name: v2.12.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Return an error if a `call` is unsupported by @dumbbell in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/449
* Add `condition` option to local queries by @dumbbell in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/450


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/compare/v2.11.0...v2.12.0

name: v2.11.0
body:
## What's Changed

* Prevent non-voting (new and not-yet-caught-up) replicas from becoming cluster leader in certain scenarios by @sile in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/435
* Exclude `non_voter` server from quorum calculation by @sile in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/427
* Sync name.dets to disk by @visciang in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/443
* Heapsize config by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/444
* coordination_SUITE: Improve wait condition in `segment_writer_or_wal_crash_leader/1` by @dumbbell in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/446
* Fix a bug where the leader is never elected even if the majority of the members are alive. by @sile in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/442
* WAL: drop entries with indexes lower or equal to the last snapshot by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/445
* Fix bug where cluster_change_permitted flag is incorrect by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/447
* Add ra_machine:snapshot_installed/2 callback. by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/448


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/compare/v2.10.1...v2.11.0

name: v2.10.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Checkpoints by @the-mikedavis in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/415
* ra_SUITE: Fix flake in consistent_query_leader_change by @the-mikedavis in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/423
* Rename ra_log snapshot_interval parameter to min_snapshot_interval by @the-mikedavis in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/422
* New handle_aux/5 API that provides a better and safer API into Ra internals. by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/414
* Add reply_mode to command meta data by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/425
* Add a gauge for the effective machine version in ra_counters by @the-mikedavis in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/426
* Update the OCI workflow by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/431
* When using multi statem call only retry for certain errors. by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/433
* Fail the OCI workflow if the ra version is not injected properly by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/434
* Fix crash caused by receiving `#append_entries_reply{success=false}` from unknown peer by @sile in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/432
* Improve Ra server resilience when log infrastructure encounters faults by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/428


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/compare/v2.9.1...v2.10.0

name: v2.10.0-pre.3

name: v2.10.0-pre.2
body:
## What's Changed
* Checkpoints by @the-mikedavis in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/415
* ra_SUITE: Fix flake in consistent_query_leader_change by @the-mikedavis in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/423
* Rename ra_log snapshot_interval parameter to min_snapshot_interval by @the-mikedavis in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/422
* New handle_aux/5 API that provides a better and safer API into Ra internals. by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/414
* Add reply_mode to command meta data by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/425
* Add a gauge for the effective machine version in ra_counters by @the-mikedavis in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/426
* Update the OCI workflow by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/431
* When using multi statem call only retry for certain errors. by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/433
* Fail the OCI workflow if the ra version is not injected properly by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/434
* Fix crash caused by receiving `#append_entries_reply{success=false}` from unknown peer by @sile in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/432
* Improve Ra server resilience when log infrastructure encounters faults by @kjnilsson in https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/pull/428


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/ra/compare/v2.9.1...v2.10.0-pre.2
